rules_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a level counter on Everlearning Student.
As long as Everlearning Student has two or more level counters on it, it gets +1/+0 and has flying.
Whenever Everlearning Student attacks, if it has four or more level counters on it, create a tapped and attacking 2/1 blue Illusion creature token.
